summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5141 for the improvement of 31st Avenue Northwest, from West 75th Street to West 80th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 59289, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
